name: The TM Group
tagline: Connecting your business, community and future.
description:
The TM Group, Inc., founded in 1984, is widely regarded as one of the most accomplished Microsoft Gold Certified partners with core expertise in the Microsoft Dynamics suite of innovative business solutions including Microsoft Dynamics GP, Microsoft Dynamics SL, Microsoft Dynamics NAV and Dynamics CRM.
The company is also a certified Portal and Collaboration Partner with technical competencies in Microsoft Office SharePoint Portal Server, Microsoft .Net Development and SQL Reporting Services.
The TM Group serves organizations across all industries, including financial services, distribution, manufacturing, healthcare, professional associations, nonprofits, entertainment, travel and hospitality. The TM Group provides a comprehensive range of technology consulting services including software evaluation and selection, custom development, implementation and support.
